caption.p: Representative images of neurologic patients, spinal cord cross-sections, H&E stain. A) Several dilated myelin sheathes are evident that B) contain macrophages consistent with digestion chambers (arrows). C) Swollen axons are present with spheroid formation (*). D) Multifocal glial nodules (arrowhead) are present within the white matter. Scale bar = 100 μm. (JPEG 92 kb)
